member.name: M:com.makarosoft.voice.util.PromptFunctions.getRegularStylePrompt
member.summary: Gets the default prompt object suitable for a multi digit press. The attempts are set from 'prompt.attempts' property in ads.properties

member.name: M:com.makarosoft.voice.util.PromptFunctions.getMenuStylePrompt
member.summary: Gets the default prompt object suitable for a single digit press. The attempts are set from 'prompt.attempts' property in ads.properties

member.name: M:com.makarosoft.voice.util.PromptFunctions.menuPrompt(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Gets a single digit response. The attempts are set from 'prompt.attempts' property in ads.properties.
member.returns: The digit pressed that is within the allowed string.
member.param: The name of the file or the phrase string to speak out
This list of digits that are acceptable

member.name: M:com.makarosoft.voice.util.PromptFunctions.regularPrompt(System.String)
member.summary: Gets a multi digit response from the user. The attempts are set from 'prompt.attempts' property in ads.properties.
member.returns: A response of any size including empty
member.param: The name of the file or the phrase string to speak out

member.name: M:com.makarosoft.voice.util.PromptFunctions.regularPrompt(System.String,System.String[])
member.summary: Gets a multi digit response from the user. The attempts are set from 'prompt.attempts' property in ads.properties.
member.returns: A response matching on of the validAnswers[] string
member.param: The name of the file or the phrase string to speak out
A string array of valid answers.

member.param: The name of the file or the phrase string to speak out

member.name: T:com.makarosoft.voice.util.Properties
